components.name: Apache Commons Codec
components.description:
The Apache Commons Codec component contains encoder and decoders for
     various formats such as Base16, Base32, Base64, digest, and Hexadecimal. In addition to these
     widely used encoders and decoders, the codec package also maintains a
     collection of phonetic encoding utilities.

components.name: Apache Commons IO
components.description:
The Apache Commons IO library contains utility classes, stream implementations, file filters,
file comparators, endian transformation classes, and much more.

components.name: Apache Commons Lang
components.description:
Apache Commons Lang, a package of Java utility classes for the
  classes that are in java.lang's hierarchy, or are considered to be so
  standard as to justify existence in java.lang.

components.name: Apache Commons Logging
components.description:
Apache Commons Logging is a thin adapter allowing configurable bridging to other,
    well-known logging systems.

components.name: commons-collections
components.description: Types that extend and augment the Java Collections Framework.
